h3_title: Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Early on, basic attacks will include a large circle of projectiles that expel from the crystal before arcing toward you. Other times, it will expel a trio of projectiles in three short bursts before they track you down in waves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Lotus-Vision', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Lotus-Vision' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Early on, basic attacks will include a large circle of projectiles that expel from the crystal before arcing toward you. Other times, it will expel a trio of projectiles in three short bursts before they track you down in waves.
